titles.title: Let's go up to Zion, let's go up to Zion,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let's go up to Zion, let's go up to Zion,
Let's go up to Zion, the city of our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing hallelujah, sing hallelujah,
Sing hallelujah, there's joy in the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There's oil and wine in Zion...
